summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6058 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, Sunset Homes Addition, being the alley between 28th Avenue Northwest and 29th Avenue Northwest, from Loyal Way to West 83rd Street; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 82817, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
